CSS Modules: Extract Imports

Transforms:

css :local(.continueButton) { composes: button from "library/button.css"; color: green; }

into:

css :import("library/button.css") { button: __tmp_487387465fczSDGHSABb; } :local(.continueButton) { composes: __tmp_487387465fczSDGHSABb; color: green; }

Specification

  • Only a certain whitelist of properties are inspected. Currently, that whitelist is ['composes'] alone.
  • An extend-import has the following format: composes: className [... className] from "path/to/file.css";

Building

npm install npm build npm test

  • Lines:
  • Statements:

Development

  • npm watch will watch src for changes and rebuild
  • npm autotest will watch src and test for changes and retest
